product.category: Flowers, Gifts and Hampers > Flowers and Plants
product.name: Single Rose Gift Set
product.description: We´ve chosen elegant Bear grass and an Aspidistra leaf as the perfect complement to a single long-stemmed red Rose presented in a stylish black vase. Plus, this gift is delivered with a 110g box of luxury Maison Fougcre chocolates.

product.category: Flowers, Gifts and Hampers > Flowers and Plants
product.name: 6 Pink Rose Hand-tied
product.description: Your Six pink Rose Hand-tied will be arranged in the hands of an expert Interflora florist, using six large-headed Roses, luxurious foliage, contrasting cellophane and ribbon. Finally, presented in a stylish Interflora gift bag, it´s sure to deliver your message perfectly.
